start.text: welcome! make the first choice of your adventure!

options.tavern: get a drink in the tavern.

options.drink: have a drink at the bar
options.play pool: approach scary guy to play pool

drink.text: you get super drunk and fall over, hit your head, and die unfortunately.

play pool.text: the scary guy glares at you, then smiles. you play pool together and actually have fun. he buys you a drink. congratulations, you made a friend!

woods.text: you have entered the spooky woods

light torch.text: you light your torch, revealing a humungous spider repelling over your head!

run.text: you run as fast as you can, tripping over roots. the spider chases, but you make it back to town safely.

fight.text: you swing your torch wildly! the spider hisses, bursts into flame, and scurries away. you find a treasure chest in its web!

proceed in the dark.text: you stumble in the dark, hearing rustling all around. suddenly, glowing eyes appear... it's a pack of wolves. they pounce, and sadly, that's the end of your story.
